data.title: John Addison The Scarlet Buccaneer UK Vinyl LP
data.meta_description: ORIGINAL SOUNDTRACK The Scarlet Buccaneer (1976 UK 13-track LP, featuring John Addison's action-filled score from the soundtrack to the swashbuckling adventure, picture sleeve. B6 End Title\End Cast Year of Release - 1976 Format - vinyl LP album (LP record) Record Label - MCA Catalogue No - MCF2779 Country of Origin - United Kingdom Availability - In Stock
